tool_description: Processes and analyzes client consultation questionnaire responses to extract preferences, requirements, and special considerations for portrait sessions.

client_id.description: Unique client identifier for the questionnaire

style_preferences.description: Photography styles: classic, modern, artistic, candid, formal, natural

color_preferences.description: Preferred color palette: warm, cool, neutral, vibrant, monochrome

special_requests.description: Any special requirements, considerations, or requests from client

experience_level.description: Client's photography experience: first_time, some_experience, experienced

comfort_level.description: Client comfort level with being photographed (1-10 scale)

inspiration_images.description: URLs or descriptions of inspiration images provided by client

timeline_flexibility.description: Client scheduling flexibility: flexible, somewhat_flexible, strict

group_size.description: Number of people to be photographed (1 to 50)

age_ranges.description: Age groups involved: infant, toddler, child, teen, adult, senior

error_messages: Client not found: The specified client_id does not exist in the system.
Invalid style preferences: Use one or more of [classic, modern, artistic, candid, formal, natural].
Invalid color preferences: Use one or more of [warm, cool, neutral, vibrant, monochrome].
Invalid experience level: Use one of [first_time, some_experience, experienced].
Invalid comfort level: Must be an integer between 1 and 10.
Invalid timeline flexibility: Use one of [flexible, somewhat_flexible, strict].
Invalid group size: Must be between 1 and 50 people.
Invalid age ranges: Use one or more of [infant, toddler, child, teen, adult, senior].
usage: Provide client_id and style_preferences as minimum requirements. Include additional parameters like color_preferences, special_requests, experience_level, and others to create a comprehensive client profile for session planning.

questionnaire_id.description: Unique identifier for the processed questionnaire

client_profile_updated.description: Whether the client profile was updated with new information

complexity_score.description: Session complexity rating from 1-10 based on requirements

recommended_session_duration.description: Suggested session duration in hours based on requirements

special_considerations.description: List of important considerations for the session planning
